name: Fresh SoundCloud
description: Fresh, light look with extra animations and new layout for sounds.
additional_info: v1.10.2 - Added and updated some animations Known issues: - Random squares appearing on blurred sound background, issue with the blur filter, can go away if you right click or hover over stuff. Haven't figured out how to fix. v1.10.1 - Fixed full width, temporary revert of SC logo, WIP new dropdowns submitted by Stylur (thanks!) v1.10 - More removal of borders, new SoundCloud logo, button fix, spacing changes, more opaque top bar v1.5 - Extra animations, stronger blur, white profile menu, better button consistency, removal of borders v1.1.2 - Added fade animation for set tracks v1.1.1 - Added ridiculously useless and fancy enable animation to make this style seem better than it actually is v1.1 - Fixed home/collection tabs, changed top bar color to fit the bottom player v1.0 - Initial

discussions.name: I Styled the Drop-Downs to Match the Rest of the Style
